attributes.action: stop all spending on the Eurofighter Typhoon Tranche 3
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eurofighter Typhoon Tranche 3 is an expensive piece of machinery that's not fit for purpose. The treasury wanted to cancel these Eurofighter orders, but were overruled by the prime minister. The PM preferring instead to waste yet more money on something that should never have been bought in the first place. Money that could have been spent protecting our troops.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop all spending on the Eurofighter Typhoon Tranche 3.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=stop-eurofighter


Her Majesty's Government
